name: The Daydream Pits
description:
Have you ever been bored at work or school and started daydreaming about doing something else entirely? Maybe your daydreaming includes destroying your tasks and collecting a precious material! Or maybe your daydreams aren't very creative. I can relate. That's why The Daydream Pits has you fighting slimes and collecting coins. While you are playing, maybe consider daydreaming that you are playing something even more fun! Maybe instead of collecting coins or collecting a paycheck, you're actually hunting for some mystical artifact! Maybe instead of killing slimes as a metaphor for completing tasks, you are actually fighting deadly dragons! 

The possibilities of your imagination are endless! Unlike the possibilities in The Daydream Pits which are pretty much what I just described above. But that's okay, none of it is real. The words you are reading aren't real either, they are just pixels arranged in a fancy way by the lightning contained within the metal rectangle you are staring at.

Game Jam Info:

This game was made for the Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1. The theme was "It is not real".

Controls:

  • WASD for movements
  • Arrow Keys to Shoot

Credits:

Developer - Boxfriend

Artist - Maharnab Saikia

All assets were made by us, with the exception of the Music used:

  • RPG Music Pack by SVL
  • 8-Bit Fantasy & Adventure by xDeviruchi
